Posts.Content: Hi Fiona, yes it's on a line, lasts half an hour I think plus the saline they put it in with.  Good luck for next week, I totally agree with you and hope it goes fast for you.  It's a strange feeling finishing, it's as though it's just starting to hit me what I've got through.   I hope it goes ok for you xx
Posts.Title: Chemo done!

Posts.Content: Yey! Me too, I just had my last chemo last Thur (I hope I can safely say, ever!).  Well done on the T, I ended up going back for another FEC.  I'll be so pleased when these bloody injections are finished too and I can draw a line under the whole chemo malarkey.  It sucks that you need rads, I'm lucky enough to skip that side but other than that...I'm walking your walk  xx
Posts.Title: Chemo done!
